tool.name: Prepare ligand
tool.description: Tool to prepare ligand for Autodock Vina

param.name: ligand
param.label: The ligand which needs to be prepared

tool.help:
** What it does? **
This tool uses the MGLTools programming packages to convert a mol2 molecule file to pdbqt molecule file, what is the Autodock Vina program uses to perform molecular docking.
** input **
It's required at least one mol2 dataset in history, what is informed in ligand field, for use the tool. The mol2 molecule file looks like the following example:
@<TRIPOS>MOLECULE NuBBE_1 21 21 0 0 0 SMALL GASTEIGER
@<TRIPOS>ATOM 1 O -0.9469 -0.4359 -3.2099 O.2 1 LIG1 -0.2449 2 C -1.2069 0.2449 -2.2351 C.2 1 LIG1 0.3396 3 O -1.9353 -0.1138 -1.1515 O.3 1 LIG1 -0.4570 4 C -2.3385 -1.4828 -1.0650 C.3 1 LIG1 0.1113 5 C -1.7447 -2.0319 0.2001 C.2 1 LIG1 -0.0480 6 C -0.5501 -2.6439 0.3381 C.2 1 LIG1 -0.0731 7 C 0.4046 -2.8855 -0.8015 C.3 1 LIG1 -0.0437 8 C -0.0862 -3.1529 1.6937 C.3 1 LIG1 -0.0285 9 C 0.7304 -2.1137 2.4728 C.3 1 LIG1 -0.0308 10 C 1.1870 -2.6184 3.8183 C.2 1 LIG1 -0.0850 11 C 2.3521 -3.2333 4.1099 C.2 1 LIG1 -0.0796 12 C 3.4007 -3.6048 3.0986 C.3 1 LIG1 -0.0440 13 C 2.6989 -3.6136 5.5272 C.3 1 LIG1 -0.0440 14 C -0.7776 1.6572 -2.0661 C.ar 1 LIG1 0.0627 15 C -0.6402 2.2240 -0.7903 C.ar 1 LIG1 -0.0026 16 C -0.2486 3.5509 -0.6768 C.ar 1 LIG1 0.1590 17 O -0.1045 4.1587 0.5397 O.3 1 LIG1 -0.5033 18 C 0.0124 4.3080 -1.8161 C.ar 1 LIG1 0.1583 19 O 0.3891 5.6141 -1.6913 O.3 1 LIG1 -0.5033 20 C -0.1020 3.7535 -3.0825 C.ar 1 LIG1 -0.0158 21 C -0.4936 2.4191 -3.2122 C.ar 1 LIG1 -0.0441 @<TRIPOS>BOND 1 1 2 2 2 2 3 1 3 3 4 1 4 4 5 1 5 5 6 2 6 6 7 1 7 6 8 1 8 8 9 1 9 9 10 1 10 10 11 2 11 11 12 1 12 11 13 1 13 2 14 1 14 14 15 ar 15 15 16 ar 16 16 17 1 17 16 18 ar 18 18 19 1 19 18 20 ar 20 20 21 ar 21 14 21 ar
